scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin contacto.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contacto.html && usemin estacionamiento.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/estacionamiento.html && usemin comercial.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/comercial.html && usemin personal.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/personal.html && usemin seguros.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/seguros.html && usemin soporte.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/soporte.html && usemin sueldos.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/sueldos.html && usemin function.php -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/function.php && usemin EnviarMailContacto.php -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/EnviarMailContacto.php
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
